description: Specifies a security configuration for OpenSearch Serverless. For more information, see SAML authentication for Amazon OpenSearch Serverless.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the security configuration.

parameters.name: samlOptions
parameters.description: Describes SAML options in in the form of a key-value map. This field is required if you specify saml for the type parameter. The XML IdP metadata file generated from your identity provider. userAttribute (string) --- A user attribute for this SAML integration. groupAttribute (string) --- The group attribute for this SAML integration. openSearchServerlessEntityId (string) --- Custom entity id attribute to override default entity id for this saml integration. sessionTimeout (integer) --- The session timeout, in minutes. Default is 60 minutes (12 hours).

nested_params.name: metadata
nested_params.description: The XML IdP metadata file generated from your identity provider.

nested_params.name: userAttribute
nested_params.description: A user attribute for this SAML integration.

nested_params.name: groupAttribute
nested_params.description: The group attribute for this SAML integration.

nested_params.name: openSearchServerlessEntityId
nested_params.description: Custom entity id attribute to override default entity id for this saml integration.

nested_params.name: sessionTimeout
nested_params.description: The session timeout, in minutes. Default is 60 minutes (12 hours).

parameters.name: iamIdentityCenterOptions
parameters.description: Describes IAM Identity Center options in the form of a key-value map. This field is required if you specify iamidentitycenter for the type parameter. The ARN of the IAM Identity Center instance used to integrate with OpenSearch Serverless. userAttribute (string) --- The user attribute for this IAM Identity Center integration. Defaults to UserId. groupAttribute (string) --- The group attribute for this IAM Identity Center integration. Defaults to GroupId.

nested_params.name: instanceArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center instance used to integrate with OpenSearch Serverless.

nested_params.name: userAttribute
nested_params.description: The user attribute for this IAM Identity Center integration. Defaults to UserId.

nested_params.name: groupAttribute
nested_params.description: The group attribute for this IAM Identity Center integration. Defaults to GroupId.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: securityConfigDetail
nested_items.description: Details about the created security configuration.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of security configuration.

nested_items.name: configVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: samlOptions
nested_items.description: SAML options for the security configuration in the form of a key-value map.

nested_items.name: metadata
nested_items.description: The XML IdP metadata file generated from your identity provider.

nested_items.name: userAttribute
nested_items.description: A user attribute for this SAML integration.

nested_items.name: groupAttribute
nested_items.description: The group attribute for this SAML integration.

nested_items.name: openSearchServerlessEntityId
nested_items.description: Custom entity id attribute to override default entity id for this saml integration.

nested_items.name: sessionTimeout
nested_items.description: The session timeout, in minutes. Default is 60 minutes (12 hours).

nested_items.name: iamIdentityCenterOptions
nested_items.description: Describes IAM Identity Center options in the form of a key-value map.

nested_items.name: instanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center instance used to integrate with OpenSearch Serverless.

nested_items.name: applicationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center application used to integrate with OpenSearch Serverless.

nested_items.name: applicationName
nested_items.description: The name of the IAM Identity Center application used to integrate with OpenSearch Serverless.

nested_items.name: applicationDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the IAM Identity Center application used to integrate with OpenSearch Serverless.

nested_items.name: userAttribute
nested_items.description: The user attribute for this IAM Identity Center integration. Defaults to UserId.

nested_items.name: groupAttribute
nested_items.description: The group attribute for this IAM Identity Center integration. Defaults to GroupId.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date the configuration was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the configuration was last modified.
